name: Bench Press
description: Compound exercise that targets the pectorals, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Dumbbell Flyes
description: Isolates the chest muscles and improves chest expansion.

name: Push-Ups
description: Bodyweight exercise that strengthens chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Barbell Squat
description: Compound movement that targets quads, glutes, and core.

name: Leg Press
description: Strengthens quads and glutes with a guided movement.

name: Lunges
description: Targets glutes, quads, and improves balance.

name: Deadlift
description: Strengthens the entire posterior chain.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Targets the lats and upper back.

name: Dumbbell Row
description: Strengthens lats, rhomboids, and rear delts.

name: Overhead Press
description: Compound movement for deltoids and triceps.

name: Lateral Raises
description: Isolates the lateral deltoids.

name: Rear Delt Fly
description: Strengthens rear delts and improves posture.

name: Bicep Curl
description: Isolates the biceps for strength and size.

name: Hammer Curl
description: Targets brachialis and forearms.

name: Chin-Ups
description: Compound movement involving biceps and back.

name: Dips
description: Strengthens triceps, chest, and shoulders.

name: Tricep Pushdown
description: Isolates the triceps with a controlled movement.

name: Tricep Kickback
description: Targets the long head of the triceps.

name: Plank
description: Strengthens abs, lower back, and stability.

name: Crunch
description: Classic exercise for the rectus abdominis.
